title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: What is the general solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the fraction with numerator cosine x, times e raised to the sine x power, and denominator cosine y " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, the arcsine of, open parenthesis, e raised to the sine x power, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, the arcsine of, open parenthesis, e raised to the sine x power, plus C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, sine x, plus arcsine C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, the arcsine of, open parenthesis, the sine of x, times e raised to the negative cosine x power, plus C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, the arcsine of, open parenthesis, e raised to the sine x power, plus C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
